section.title: Pre-Install Requirements and Prerequisites
section.para: Ensure that the following requirements have been met before continuing with the installation.

section.title: Hardware Requirements
section.para: RAM and Java Heap size are very important with regards to Resource Adaptor. The more the RAM, the better the performance will be. For instance, while the underlying Mobicents JAIN SLEE may run with 1GB of RAM, 8GB is needed to achieve performance higher than 800 new requests per second

Memory is only needed to store the Resource Adaptor state. Therefore, the faster the CPU, the more requests per second can be quickly processed. That said, there is no minimum specified CPU speed required to use the RA.

section.title: Software Prerequisites
section.para: The RA requires that &THIS.PLATFORM; is correctly set and that Mobicents Diameter Multiplexer (MUX), which includes the stack and the &THIS.PLATFORM; is correctly installed.

step.title: Building the source code

important.para: Maven 2.0.9 (or higher) is used to build the release. Instructions for using Maven2, including install, can be found at

step.para: Use Maven to build the deployable unit binary.

Once the build is completed, you should have the deployable-unit jar file in the target directory, if &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE is installed and environment variable JBOSS_HOME is pointing to its underlying &JEE.PLATFORM; directory, then the deployable unit jar will also be deployed in the container.

section.title: Uninstalling &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor
section.para: To uninstall the Resource Adaptor simply execute provided ant script build.xml undeploy target:
The script will delete the RA deployable unit jar from the default &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE server profile deploy directory, to undeploy from another server profile use the argument -Dnode=.
